title: DreamWeaver
description: This short suspense novella is perfect for fans of Stephen King, Dean Koonz and Clive Cussler . . . Zeke Jackson's sister has gone missing in the jungles of Southeast Asia. His search for her takes him from the red light districts of Vietnam to the mean streets of New York. Finally he finds the help he needs in the back alleys of one of South Africa's most notorious shanty towns. The DreamWeaver. But the things Zeke will have to do, and the price he'll have to pay to get Jane back are beyond anything he ever expected.
author: Rejean Giguere
